name: happy-ryu-02 // An Apple II Ryu (The 'Happy Ryu' Series)
description:
I could never imagine SFII on an Apple II but at least I now know how Ryu might've looked in one.

Part of a series of 43 movies using vintage computers and game consoles. Complete info at: https://github.com/electrocomfort/art-units/tree/main/happy-ryu
